channel.title: Upgrade Whonix VirtualBox 14 -> Whonix VirtualBox 15 - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
Upgrades are possible.
Whonix for VirtualBox version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded version 15 (Debian buster based).
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Upgrading_Whonix_14_to_Whonix_15
Testers wanted!
Alternatively, see previous news for new image downloads: https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-virtualbox-15-0-0-0-7-debian-buster-based-testers-wanted/7131
----
Other Whonix platforms version 15: [Qubes-Whonix](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes) / [Whonix KVM](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM): unavailable at this point. A separate call for testers will be posted later. [Stay tuned!](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stay_Tuned)

item.title: Upgrade Whonix VirtualBox 14 -> Whonix VirtualBox 15 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.3.3 - Debian buster based - Testers Wanted! News
Testers Wanted! Download the Testers-Only version of Whonix for VirtualBox: Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible, see Upgrade Whonix VirtualBox 14 -> Whonix VirtualBox 15 - Testers Wanted!. Other Whonix platforms version 15: Qubes-Whonix 15 TemplateVMs (Debian buster based) (4.0.1-201906232114) -- Testers Wanted!

Read full topic
item.source: Upgrade Whonix VirtualBox 14 -> Whonix VirtualBox 15 - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Upgrade Whonix VirtualBox 14 -> Whonix VirtualBox 15 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
TNT_BOM_BOM:

Tested the instructions and working good.

Awesome, thanks for testing!

TNT_BOM_BOM:

The package not there in first place:

  • apt-get purge exim*

Yes. Not sure when it is there and when not. Just keeping it for there where it is (was on some of my systems).

TNT_BOM_BOM:

already installed:

  • apt-get install non-qubes-whonix-gateway-xfce
  • apt-get install non-qubes-whonix-workstation-xfce

Added a comment to clarify just now:

Itâ€™s possible that the following package is already installed. This step is only here to ensure it really is.

Read full topic
item.source: Upgrade Whonix VirtualBox 14 -> Whonix VirtualBox 15 - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Upgrade Whonix VirtualBox 14 -> Whonix VirtualBox 15 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Tested the instructions and working good.

Expected behavior:

The package not there in first place:

  • apt-get purge exim*

already installed:

  • apt-get install non-qubes-whonix-gateway-xfce
  • apt-get install non-qubes-whonix-workstation-xfce

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrade Whonix VirtualBox 14 -> Whonix VirtualBox 15 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Upgrades are possible.

Whonix for VirtualBox version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded version 15 (Debian buster based).

Whonix

Upgrading Whonix 14 to Whonix 15

How to Release Upgrade from Whonix 14 to Whonix 15

Testers wanted!

Alternatively, see previous news for new image downloads: Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.0.7 - Debian buster based - Testers Wanted!

Other Whonix platforms version 15:
Qubes-Whonix / Whonix KVM: unavailable at this point. A separate call for testers will be posted later. Stay tuned!
